column4: I am so screwed, does anyone know how to use OpenOffice Impress animations properly? I need to animate an image in a slide, making it slightly smaller, makes space for text.
Can anyone tell me how? I have searched, googled, watched dozens of howto vids.. nothing tells me how to do this...
can you just progressivly change slides
Yeah like that, only thing I can think of
ugh,, i'm not sure i like that idea.
what are you trying to do
just trying to make it look well
Yeah I would too, I share your pain with Ooo
a smooth transition, then slide the text in underneath, it would be impactful.
I see the idea, have no idea though
urg,, sorry, meant to say thanks to you :)
something like that...... (ghost in the machine)
think i got my acronym wrong,, ,tsp maybe,, ummm, whichever one means through supernatural ability :P
like I said, I'm a ghost in the machine
